text: Anjali Devi () ; 24 August 1927 â€“ 13 January 2014) was a Telugu and Tamil actress and movie producer. She was known for her role as Sita in Lava Kusha and roles in movies like Suvarna Sundari and Anarkali. She died at the age of 86 on 13 January 2014. She died at Vijaya Hospital in Chennai from multiple organ failure. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Golden Nandi for Krishnaveni Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian movie producers Category:People of British India
title: Anjali Devi
